description: Make a dinner the whole family will love with this easy butter chicken recipe. Enjoy it topped with crunchy mini pappadums.
keywords: Butter chicken,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Egg free
name: Creamy butter chicken curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken thigh fillets, cut into 3cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook, stirring, for 8 minutes or until chicken is browned all over.

Add tomato paste, butter chicken paste, cream and 1/4 cup water, and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and sauce thickens slightly.
Top butter chicken with almonds and coriander. Serve with mini pappadums.
